entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
